292313.「ぬぬ？ 考え直しますかな。\n 聖紋と引き換えにさずける 探索の極意を\n ひ:
Hmm? Changed your mind? Please choose one
of the exploration secrets I'll give you
in exchange for crests.
<break>

292314.<select_se_off>\n探索開始時 海神のうろこ３個追加\n錬金効果＋:
<select_se_off>
Begin with 3 Scales
Find All +3 Equipment
Can Take 2 Extra Equips
Explanation
Cancel
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case 3>
<close>
<case 4>
<break>
<case 5>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

292316.「探索の極意は 遺跡の探索に\n 効果を発揮する 特殊なわざなのです。\n １回:
A secret of exploration is a special technique that's effective while searching the ruins. Its effect lasts for one exploration.
Only the party leader's secret will take effect, and all party members will benefit from it.
Rest assured, those member's secrets won't be overwritten from the leader's effect.
Furthermore, your secret will remain so long as you don't explore the ruins, so do as you wish in the meantime.
I can only give you one secret at a time, so please examine each one carefully.
Lastly, you can view your current secret at the entrance menu here or the Zelmea Menu inside of the ruins.

292317.ゼルメアの聖紋<%nM_EXCHANGE_NUM>個と 引き換えに\n<%sM_:
You'll give me <%dM_EXCHANGE_NUM> Zelmea Crests in exchange
for <%sM_Kouka>?
<yesno2>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

292318.「かたじけない。さずけた探索の極意は\n １回の探索のあいだ 効果がありますぞ。:
Much appreciated. The secret I've given will last for one exploration.
In a party, the leader's secret will take effect and all members will benefit. Good luck!

292319.<pc>は 冒険者ジグロウから\n探索の極意を さずけてもらった！<se_not:
<pc> was a given a secret of
exploration from Adventurer Jiguro!<se_nots System 7>

294215.「……やや 遺跡の探索者でありますかな？\n<br>\n「拙者は ジグロウと申す:
...hey, aren't you an explorer of these ruins?
My name is Jiguro. I'm adventurer and a collector, and love to collect armor from all over the world.
I've been so fascinated with these strange ruins and collecting armor that I ran out of Zelmea Crests to use.
You are... , I presume. I see you've been collecting armor as well.
I'd be grateful for any Zelmea Crests you could share. In exchange, I'll show you some exploration secrets I have learned.

294216.「……やや <pc>殿ではありませぬか！\n 遺跡の探索に 向かわれるのですかな:
...well, if it isn't ! Are you planning to explore the ruins?
I'd like go exploring too, but I got a bit carried away with collecting armor that I ran out of Zelmea Crests.
I'd be grateful for any Zelmea Crests you could share. In exchange, I'll show you some exploration secrets I have learned.

294217.「おお 気が変わりましたかな。\n 拙者が会得した 探索の極意を さずけるゆえ\:
Oh, you changed your mind? If you share your
crests with me, I will share my secrets
of exploration.
<bw_break>

294218.「おお <pc>殿！\n 聖紋をいただき 感謝いたす。\n これでまた 防具の収:
Oh, ! Thank you for the crests. Now I can resume collecting armor.
Please take care, . I would be grateful if those secrets end up being of some use to you.

294219.「聖紋と 引き換えにさずける\n 探索の極意を ひとつ 選んでくだされ。\n<b:
Choose an exploration secret to exchange for
Zelmea Crests.
<break>

294220.「もし ほかの探索の極意を ご所望であれば\n ひとつ 選び直してくだされ。\n:
If you would like another secret, please
choose another. It won't cost you any crests.
<break>

294221.「探索の極意を ひとつ 選び直してくだされ。\n 選び直しに 聖紋は必要ありませ:
Please select one secret. It won't cost
any crests to select again.
<break>

294222.「……むむ？ どうやら ゼルメアの聖紋を\n 持っていないようですな……。\n:
...Hm? It seems you do not have any Zelmea
Crests.... Looks like we'll have to do this
another time.
<end>

294223.遺跡内では パーティリーダーの 探索の極意が\nパーティ全員にかかりますが よろ:
The party leader's exploration secret will be
applied to the party. Is this okay? The other
members' secrets will not be overwritten.
<yesno2><break>

So you'd like to have <%sM_Kouka2>
instead of <%sM_Kouka>?
<yesno>

294397.「むむ？ その探索の極意は\n すでに さずけておりますぞ。\n<bw_brea:
Hmm? I've already given you a secret.
